thread.title: Samuel Schnapp
thread.title_full: Sunday Afternoons reviewed by Samuel Schnapp

author: Samuel Schnapp
title: Samuel Schnapp
text: I bought the swimming hat thinking it would be practical but look ridiculous. No so! It looks pretty nice! It's winter now so I haven't worn it at the beach but the strap holds well and should stay on as I swim. It will protect my scalp, forehead, ears and face from sun rays while in water, where there's lots of UV exposure.
